fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Frame a player to appear to be the role of Post 371.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May not spawn unless I really hate post 371 is in the game.
- You are not Post 371, you are Post 250.
- Those framed as Post 371 will roleflip to be Post 371, but will not actually be Post 371.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause I really hate post 371 to kill the wrong target at least once.
